channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: One Tech Tip: How to get started with Bluesky
item.description: Looking for a new social media platform? You could try Bluesky, where the vibe is seemingly welcoming and there are noticeably fewer trolls.

item.title: Federal Reserve’s likely slowdown in rate cuts could disappoint borrowers
item.description: Just a few weeks ago, the path ahead for the Federal Reserve looked straightforward: With inflation cooling and the job market slowing, the Fed appeared on track to steadily cut interest rates.

item.title: Fans can step up to the plate for Red Sox CEO’s memorabilia at auction
item.description: A Boston auctioneer is taking bidders out to the ballpark with an auction of a team executive’s Red Sox memorabilia — including four World Series trophies.
